alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee and Iberville Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over mainly rural areas of Iberville, West Baton Rouge, and Pointe Coupee Parishes, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah and Erwinville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
